definitions.definition: (Ultimate Frisbee) A long throw, generally at least half a field in length.
A drop or jump off a cliff or cornice.

definitions.example: He was so angry that he hucked the book at my face.

definitions.definition: To throw oneself off a large jump or drop.
To throw one's body in the air, possibly in a way that is ungraceful or lacks skill.
(Ultimate Frisbee) To throw a frisbee a long distance.
(Ultimate Frisbee) To make a long throw with the frisbee; to start a point by making such a throw.
(mountain biking) To attempt a particularly big jump or drop, often haphazardly.
definitions.example: A longer fork makes the bike more cumbersome, but you will be able to huck more stuff.

definitions.definition: (mountain biking) To make a maneuver in a clumsy or poorly planned way.
(whitewater kayaking) To paddle off a waterfall or to boof a big drop.
definitions.example: I hucked a sweet 25-foot waterfall on the Tomata River.
